00177 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00178 #define SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(auth) \
00179         (*(struct svc_rpc_gss_data **)&(auth)->svc_ah_private)
00180  
00181 struct svc_rpc_gss_data {
00182       bool_t                  established;    /* context established */
00183       gss_ctx_id_t            ctx;            /* context id */
00184       struct rpc_gss_sec      sec;            /* security triple */
00185       gss_buffer_desc         cname;          /* GSS client name */
00186       u_int                   seq;            /* sequence number */
00187       u_int                   win;            /* sequence window */
00188       u_int                   seqlast;        /* last sequence number */
00189       uint32_t                seqmask;        /* bitmask of seqnums */
00190       gss_name_t              client_name;    /* unparsed name string */
00191       gss_buffer_desc         checksum;       /* so we can free it */
00192     };
00193 #endif 
00194 
00195 const char * Rpc_gss_svc_name[] = { "no name", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY" } ;

00198 static void split_credname( char * credname, char * username, char * domainname )
00199 {
00200    char * piter = NULL ;
00201    int    pos   = 0 ;
00202 
00203    /* Cred Name is "name@DOMAIN" */
00204    for( piter = credname ; *piter != '@' && *piter != '\0' ; pos++, piter++) ;
00205 
00206    strncpy( username, credname, pos ) ;
00207    username[pos] = '\0' ;
00208    strcpy( domainname, piter+1 ) ;
00209 }

00211 #ifdef _HAVE_GSSAPI
00212 
00226 static void convert_gss_status2str( char * str, OM_uint32 maj_stat, OM_uint32 min_stat)
00227 {
00228         OM_uint32 min;
00229         gss_buffer_desc msg;
00230         int msg_ctx = 0;
00231         FILE * tmplog ;
00232 
00233         gss_display_status(&min, maj_stat, GSS_C_GSS_CODE, GSS_C_NULL_OID,
00234                            &msg_ctx, &msg);
00235         sprintf( str, "GSS_CODE=%s - ", (char *)msg.value);
00236         gss_release_buffer( &min, &msg);
00237 
00238         gss_display_status(&min, min_stat, GSS_C_MECH_CODE, GSS_C_NULL_OID, &msg_ctx, &msg);
00239         sprintf( str, "MECH_CODE=%s\n", (char *)msg.value);
00240         gss_release_buffer(&min, &msg);
00241 } /* convert_gss_status2str */
00242 #endif

00256 exportlist_t * nfs_Get_export_by_id( exportlist_t * exportroot, unsigned short exportid )
00257 {
00258   exportlist_t * piter ;
00259   int found = 0 ;
00260   
00261   for( piter = exportroot ; piter != NULL ; piter = piter->next )
00262     {
00263       if( piter->id == exportid )
00264         {
00265           found = 1 ;
00266           break ;
00267         }
00268     } /* for */
00269   
00270   if( found == 0 ) 
00271     return NULL ;
00272   else
00273     return piter ;
00274 } /* nfs_Get_export_by_id */

00290 int nfs_build_fsal_context( struct svc_req            * ptr_req, 
00291                             exportlist_client_entry_t * pexport_client, 
00292                             exportlist_t              * pexport,
00293                             fsal_op_context_t         * pcontext ) 
00294 {
00295   struct authunix_parms  * punix_creds       = NULL ;
00296 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00297   struct svc_rpc_gss_data * gd = NULL ;
00298   gss_buffer_desc           oidbuff ;
00299   OM_uint32                 maj_stat = 0 ;
00300   OM_uint32                 min_stat = 0 ;
00301   char                      username[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00302   char                      domainname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00303 #endif
00304   fsal_status_t             fsal_status ;
00305   uid_t                     caller_uid        = 0 ;
00306   gid_t                     caller_gid        = 0 ;
00307   unsigned int              caller_glen       = 0 ;
00308   gid_t                   * caller_garray     = NULL ;
00309   unsigned int              rpcxid            = 0 ;
00310   char                      errormsg[GSS_DEFINE_LEN_TEMP] ;
00311   
00312   rpcxid = get_rpc_xid( ptr_req ) ;
00313 
00314   switch( ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor )
00315     {
00316     case AUTH_NONE:
00317       /* Nothing to be done here... */
00318 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00319       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_NONE", rpcxid ) ;
00320 #endif
00321       break ;
00322       
00323     case AUTH_UNIX:
00324 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00325       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_UNIX", rpcxid ) ;
00326 #endif
00327       /* We map the rq_cred to Authunix_parms */
00328       punix_creds = (struct authunix_parms *)ptr_req->rq_clntcred ;
00329       
00330       /* Get the uid/gid couple */
00331       caller_uid    = punix_creds->aup_uid ;
00332       caller_gid    = punix_creds->aup_gid ;
00333       caller_glen   = punix_creds->aup_len ;
00334       caller_garray = punix_creds->aup_gids ;
00335       
00336       break ;
00337 
00338 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00339     case RPCSEC_GSS:
00340 #ifndef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00341       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_UNIX", rpcxid ) ;
00342 #endif
00343       /* Get the gss data to process them */
00344       gd = SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(ptr_req->rq_xprt->xp_auth);
00345       
00346       printf( "----> RPCSEC_GSS svc=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY=%u\n", 
00347                   gd->sec.svc, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY ) ;
00348  
00349       printf( "----> Client=%s length=%u   Qop=%u\n", 
00350               (char *)gd->cname.value, gd->cname.length, gd->sec.qop ) ;
00351  
00352       if( ( maj_stat = gss_oid_to_str( &min_stat, 
00353                                        gd->sec.mech,  
00354                                        &oidbuff ) ) != GSS_S_COMPLETE )
00355         {
00356             fprintf( stderr, "Erreur de gss_oid_to_str: %u|%u\n", maj_stat, min_stat ) ;
00357             exit( 1 ) ; 
00358         }
00359       printf( "----> Client mech=%s len=%u\n", (char *)oidbuff.value, oidbuff.length ) ;
00360  
00361       /* Je fais le menage derriere moi */
00362       (void)gss_release_buffer( &min_stat, &oidbuff ) ;
00363 
00364       split_credname( (char *)gd->cname.value, username, domainname ) ;
00365     
00366       printf( "----> User=%s Domain=%s\n", username, domainname ) ; 
00367    
00368       /* Convert to uid */ 
00369       if( !name2uid( username, &caller_uid ) )  
00370         return FALSE ;
00371 
00372       printf( "----> Uid=%u\n", (unsigned int)caller_uid ) ;
00373       caller_gid    = 0 ;
00374       caller_glen   = 0 ;
00375       caller_garray = 0 ;
00376 
00377       break ;
00378 #endif /* _USE_GSSRPC */
00379      
00380     default:
00381 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00382       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: FAILURE : Request xid=%u, has unsupported authentication %d", 
00383                        rpcxid, ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor ) ;
00384 #endif
00385       /* Reject the request for weak authentication and return to worker */
00386       return FALSE ;
00387       
00388       break ;
00389     } /* switch( ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor ) */
00390  
00391   /* Do we have root access ? */
00392   if( ( caller_uid == 0 ) && !( pexport_client->options & EXPORT_OPTION_ROOT) )
00393     caller_uid = -2 ;
00394 
00395   /* Build the credentials */
00396   fsal_status = FSAL_GetClientContext( pcontext,
00397                                        &pexport->FS_export_context,
00398                                        caller_uid,
00399                                        caller_gid,
00400                                        caller_garray,
00401                                        caller_glen);
00402 
00403   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00404     {
00405       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_EVENT,
00406                        "NFS DISPATCHER: FAILURE: Could not get credentials for (uid=%d,gid=%d), fsal error=(%d,%d)",
00407                        caller_uid,  caller_gid,
00408                        fsal_status.major, fsal_status.minor ) ;
00409       return FALSE ;
00410     }
00411 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00412   else
00413     DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCHER: FSAL Cred acquired for (uid=%d,gid=%d)",
00414                      caller_uid,  caller_gid ) ;
00415 #endif
00416  
00417   return TRUE ;
00418 } /* nfs_build_fsal_context */
00419 
00430 int nfs_compare_clientcred( nfs_client_cred_t * pcred1,  nfs_client_cred_t * pcred2 )
00431 {
00432    if( pcred1 == NULL ) return FALSE ;
00433    if( pcred2 == NULL ) return FALSE ;
00434 
00435    if( pcred1->flavor != pcred2->flavor ) return FALSE ;
00436 
00437    if( pcred1->length != pcred2->length ) return FALSE ;
00438 
00439    switch( pcred1->flavor ) 
00440     {
00441         case AUTH_UNIX:
00442                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid  != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid ) return FALSE ;
00443                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid  != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid ) return FALSE ;
00444                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time ) return FALSE ;
00445                 break ;
00446 
00447         default:
00448                 if( memcmp( &pcred1->auth_union, &pcred2->auth_union, pcred1->length ) ) return FALSE ;
00449                 break ;
00450     }
00451 
00452 
00453    /* If this point is reach, structures are the same */
00454    return TRUE ;
00455 } /* nfs_compare_clientcred */
00456 
00457 
00458 int nfs_rpc_req2client_cred( struct svc_req * reqp, nfs_client_cred_t * pcred )
00459 { 
00460   char errormsg[GSS_DEFINE_LEN_TEMP] ;
00461 
00462   /* Structure for managing basic AUTH_UNIX authentication */
00463   struct authunix_parms  * aup = NULL ;
00464 
00465   /* Stuff needed for managing RPCSEC_GSS */
00466 #ifdef _HAVE_GSSAPI
00467   gss_buffer_desc           mechname;
00468   gss_buffer_desc           clientname ;
00469   OM_uint32                 maj_stat = 0 ;
00470   OM_uint32                 min_stat = 0 ;
00471 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00472   struct svc_rpc_gss_data * gd = NULL ;
00473 #endif
00474   gss_buffer_desc           oidbuff ;
00475   char                      errbuff[1024] ;
00476 #endif
00477 
00478    if( reqp== NULL || pcred == NULL )
00479         return -1 ;
00480 
00481    pcred->flavor = reqp->rq_cred.oa_flavor ;
00482    pcred->length = reqp->rq_cred.oa_length ;
00483 
00484    switch( reqp->rq_cred.oa_flavor )
00485     {
00486         case AUTH_NONE:
00487            /* Do nothing... because there seems like nothing is to be done... */
00488            break ;
00489 
00490         case AUTH_UNIX:
00491            aup = (struct authunix_parms *)(reqp->rq_clntcred);
00492 
00493            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid = aup->aup_uid ;
00494            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid = aup->aup_gid ;
00495            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time = aup->aup_time ;
00496 
00497            break ;
00498 
00499 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00500         case RPCSEC_GSS:
00501            /* Extract the information from the RPCSEC_GSS opaque structure */
00502            gd = SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(reqp->rq_xprt->xp_auth);
00503 
00504            pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.svc = (unsigned int)(gd->sec.svc) ;
00505            pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.qop = (unsigned int)(gd->sec.qop) ;
00506 
00507            strncpy( pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.cname, gd->cname.value, NFS_CLIENT_NAME_LEN ) ;
00508 
00509            if( ( maj_stat = gss_oid_to_str( &min_stat, 
00510                                             gd->sec.mech,  
00511                                             &oidbuff ) ) != GSS_S_COMPLETE )
00512              {
00513                 convert_gss_status2str( errbuff, maj_stat, min_stat) ;
00514                 DisplayLog( "GSSAPI ERROR: %u|%u = %s", maj_stat, min_stat, errbuff ) ;
00515                 return -1 ; 
00516              }
00517            strncpy( pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.stroid, oidbuff.value, NFS_CLIENT_NAME_LEN ) ;
00518  
00519            /* Je fais le menage derriere moi */
00520            (void)gss_release_buffer( &min_stat, &oidbuff ) ;
00521            break ;
00522 #endif
00523 
00524         default:
00525            /* Unsupported authentication flavour */
00526            return -1 ;
00527            break ;
00528     }
00529 
00530   return 1 ; 
00531 } /* nfs_rpc_req2client_cred */
